original_text: When Saul heard that David was discovered, and the men that were with him, (now Saul abode in Gibeah under a tree in Ramah, having his spear in his hand, and all his servants were standing about him;)
korean_text: 사울이 다윗과 그와 함께 있는 사람들이 나타났다 함을 들으니라 그 때에 사울이 기브아 높은 곳에서 손에 단창을 들고 에셀 나무 아래에 앉았고 모든 신하들은 그의 곁에 섰더니

sentences.original_text: When Saul heard that David was discovered
sentences.korean_translation: 사울이 다윗이 발견되었다는 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: and the men that were with him
having his spear in his hand
and all his servants were standing about him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 종들이 그의 주위에 서 있었다
